content.description: Bruce Doeren & I did a route up the center of these slabs in the summer of 1978 ... impossible to retrace the line, but not necessary, either, as the slab is angled such that all parts of it are easily climbable ... originally done in two pitches but with longer ropes it might just go in one ... sorry I don't have a name for the route, I don't recall Bruce & I even discussing it ... likewise, if if anyone has a better name for the feature, I will gladly defer....
content.protection: Provided you bring a rope, a few pieces of pro should suffice ... though I can imagine a lot of people just doing it free-solo ...
content.location: Look between The Legs & Questa Dome

content.description: Prominent flatiron situated between The Legs & the Dome proper ... one to two pitches long if roped ...
